Listen, <WH7181> house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> and give ear, <WH238> house <WH1004> of the king! <WH4428> For the judgment <WH4941> is against you; <WH6341> for you have been a snare at Mizpah, <WH4709> and a net <WH7568> spread <WH6566> on Tabor. <WH8396>

"Blow <WH8628> the cornet <WH7782> in Gibeah, <WH1390> and the trumpet <WH2689> in Ramah! <WH7414> Sound a battle <WH7321> cry at Beth Aven, <WH1007> behind <WH310> you, <WH1144> Benjamin!

"When Ephraim <WH669> saw <WH7200> his sickness, <WH2483> and Judah <WH3063> his wound, <WH4205> Then Ephraim <WH669> went <WH3212> to Assyria, <WH804> and sent <WH7971> to king <WH4428> Jareb: <WH3377> but he is not able <WH3201> to heal <WH7495> you, <WH1455> neither will he cure you of your wound. <WH4205>
